characterList: 冗沉軍輝運冠夢坑高享熟亭亮京涼景就周週士吉買賣

characters.story: See how the roof forms superfluous? It whispers "Rong" softly!
The water takes the shape of profound, asking "Chen? How deep?" curiously!
This character represents army, singing "June!" cheerfully - a vivid image to remember!
The strokes unite to show radiance, singing "Hway!" cheerfully!
The army walked and moved supplies, carrying everything.
Like a roof, this character means crown and sings "Gwan!" - a vivid image to remember!
Like grass, this character means a dream and shouts "Mung!"!
The soil takes the shape of pit, singing "Kung!" cheerfully!
"Gao!" The tall building reached high into the sky.
A striking symbol for to enjoy that whispers "Shyang" softly!
Like fire, this character means ripe and asks "Shoo? Is it done?"!
A pavilion tall nail questions "Ting? Rest here?" curiously!
A striking symbol for shining that shouts "Lyang!" sharply - a vivid image to remember!
The mouth takes the shape of capital, singing "Jing!" cheerfully!
Like water, this character means cool and asks "Lyang? Refreshing?"!
The sun stands for scenery, whispering "Jing" softly as sunlight streams across the sky!
"Jyo, do it now!" he commanded, immediately at once with the capital dog.
The mouth stands for circumference, singing "Joe!" cheerfully!
The strokes unite to show week, singing "Joe!" cheerfully - a vivid image to remember!
The strokes unite to show soldier, shouting "Shi!" sharply - a vivid image to remember!
The mouth stands for lucky, asking "Ji? Good fortune?" curiously!
A striking symbol for to buy that whispers "Mai" softly - a vivid image to remember!
"Buy low, sell high!" She traded shellfish at market.
